original_title: Loyalty No Royalty, The Breakup Of Tony! Toni! Toné!
overview: The untold story of the break up of the legendary R&B band from Oakland, CA. The trio, in fact began as a six member band in 1988 and successfully climbed the charts into the late 1990's. Unfortunately greed fueled mistrust and eventually the demise of the original band.
title: Loyalty No Royalty, The Breakup Of Tony! Toni! Toné!
